p.span: It is the mission of the Pine Grove Area School District Board, faculty, and staff to Promote Growth, Achievement, Success, and Direction for all children. PGASD for all children!

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.strong: Pine Grove Area School District School Board Meeting

span.p: You are invited to attend the April 16, 2020 School Board Meeting for the Pine Grove Area School District at 6:30 PM. This meeting will take place virtually due to the COVID 19 pandemic.
To attend this meeting virtually, please register at PGASD School Board Meeting Registration.

Once registered, an email will be sent to you with the link to connect to the meeting. The agenda for this meeting will be available the morning of April 16, 2020. General public comments on a specific agenda item may be emailed to public_comment@pgasd.com prior to the board meeting. The school board is temporarily suspending public comment on non-agenda items.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: Students/Parents in grades 6-12, if you are in need of your Schoology username and/or password please complete the Google Form below. Your information will be sent to you by Schoology via email. Please check the email address you provide in the form. *Note: you may need to check your spam folder for the response from Schoology.

span.strong: For NEW Schoology Access Codes and Accounts

span.p: Any parent that would like Schoology access, please contact any of your student’s teachers and request a Parent Code. Instructions on creating your account are available here.

div.p: ALiCE is an options-based response which can increase survivability when faced with an active intruder situation. The program relies on the premise of providing information, authorizing decision making and participating in proactive training.
